scenario_1.persona_desc: A genealogist or historian who is interested in Jewish history and the preservation of Jewish cemeteries. They are likely to be interested in the above text as it provides details about the Jewish history and cemeteries in Eufaula, Alabama, including the B'nai Israel congregation and the Jewish cemetery. They may also be interested in the history of the city and its development, as well as the preservation of historical sites and cemeteries.
scenario_1.thought: As a genealogist and historian interested in Jewish history and preservation, my primary motivation in this experiment wouldn't be maximizing personal gain. The options are: (Left) Both Person A and I receive 400, or (Right) I receive 400 and Person A receives 750. Given my interest in the broader community and historical preservation, I don't see a reason to prefer that the other person receives less. It feels more aligned with my values to allow the other person to receive more, especially since my own payoff remains the same. Thus, option (Right) seems slightly preferable.
